action.program_description: Calendar application displaying the week of November 11-17, 2024
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows a calendar application open on a computer. The calendar is displaying the week of November 11th to 17th, 2024. The current date is Saturday, November 16th.  A pop-up window displays details of an event scheduled for Sunday, November 17th, from 3 PM to 4 PM, titled "Client Meeting: Fujitsu". Another event, "Important Meeting with Boss," is scheduled for the same day. The current time is 1:00 PM. The user is hovering the mouse over the "Client Meeting: Fujitsu" event details.
